components.application

Class SelectingIntersectionState

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.application.MainControllerState
      • components.application.WaitOpenCityMapState
        • components.application.WaitOpenDeliveryRequestState
          • components.application.SelectingIntersectionState

  • public class SelectingIntersectionState
extends WaitOpenDeliveryRequestState
    This class represents the state of the application when it is waiting for the user to choose an intersection on the map. This state is entered by a request to the MapService and response (Intersecion) is provided by resolving a future.

      • onIntersectionSelection

        @NotNull
public MainControllerState onIntersectionSelection(@NotNull
                                                            IntersectionSelectionEvent event)
        Resolve the future provided by the request and return to the ComputedPlanningState state.

        The IntersectionSelectionEvent is normally generated by the MapCanvas.

        Overrides:
        onIntersectionSelection in class MainControllerState
        Parameters:
        event - An event containing the selected intersection.
        Returns:
        The next state (ComputedPlanningState) if the result was valid, otherwise it stays in this state.
